section.title: hot keys creating new Hot Key
section.para: To create a new Hot Key, select the NEW button. The following screen will appear:
When creating a new Hot Key, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select a keyboard keystroke from the list of available keystrokes.
The list will include all keystrokes which may linked to a specific action. Only one action at a time may be assigned to a single keystroke. For multiple actions, multiple keystrokes must be used.
Display lists actions you may associate with keystrokes.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without creating a Hot Key, returning you to the application desktop.
Creates the Hot Key and adds it to the list of Hot Keys.
